title: 02/22/22 DPS Hour 1 - Rob Parker & Mike Harmon Guest Hosting
itunes:title: 02/22/22 DPS Hour 1 - Rob Parker & Mike Harmon Guest Hosting
description:
Rob Parker and Mike Harmon, in for Dan, react to Juwan Howard receiving a 5 game suspension for his actions after Michigan's loss to Wisconsin. The guys explain why the handshake line needs to stay in college basketball. Rob and Mike discuss the Suns' title hopes after losing Chris Paul for an extended amount of time.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
